divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in mybed listening to music and looking out my window when i saw an extremly bright ilght mvoing across the sky. when i first saw it i thought i was plane but it was shaped like a t with a saucer in the middle of it. it also had to big lights on the front at 10 27 the first one flew in southern direction as it was leaving, a second object that looked the same and flew at the same rather fast speed criscrosed it and flew in a eastern direction. as it flew through the clouds it iluminated the clouds very brightly and kept going, then it left. aruond 11.00 a third one flew by. i atached a drawing of what it looked like. thought there really crappy becasue they were odn e on ms paint. i would really apreciate if you could look into this i have no idea what that coulda been btu it certainl wasnt earthly.
Summary: 2 "T" shaped objects were seen flying through the sky. They we moving extremly fast and were very bright.
